mapper.select: select id, o_id, create_time, electricity_cabinet_id, cell_no, status,type, uid from electricity.t_electricity_cabinet_order_oper_history where id = #{id}
select id, o_id, create_time, electricity_cabinet_id, cell_no, status,type, uid from electricity.t_electricity_cabinet_order_oper_history limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into electricity.t_electricity_cabinet_order_oper_history(o_id, create_time, electricity_cabinet_id, cell_no, status,type, uid) values (#{oId}, #{createTime}, #{electricityCabinetId}, #{cellNo}, #{status},#{type}, #{uid})
mapper.update:
update electricity.t_electricity_cabinet_order_oper_history
o_id = #{oId},
create_time = #{createTime},
electricity_cabinet_id = #{electricityCabinetId},
cell_no = #{cellNo},
status = #{status},
status = #{type},
uid = #{uid},
where id = #{id}
